name: Lulu & Ennoi - Sacred Suit Girls
description:
You play the role of a gentleman in this turn-based roleplaying game.



Game Features

●No phase switching or downtime, strategize and shape your romantic tale with limited life pool.



●Each heroine has 4 unique outfits to collect.



●An engaging world with sacred outfit ascension system.



●Challenge social limits, crush the mosiac that hinders you from paradise!



Multiple endings for each heroine.





After a fated encounter with two girls, the newly chosen hero embarks on an adventure. Faced with the succubus race's imminent destruction, will he stand by his chivalrous path of a hero or pave way for an uncertain peace between the races?





Hero



Our newly appointed hero journeys the world alongside the devoted sister Lulu Elpida, and the sharp-tongued Ennoi Boweiter. Despite his stoic personality, he can't help but want to tease these tempting heroines.



Lulu Elpida



Age: 18
Cup Size: E
Height: 160cm
Weight:　48kg
Job: Inquisitor
Likes: God, potato stew
Dislike: Demonic beings, eggplants
Outward Persona: Sincere, responsible and caring for others like a big sister.
Inner Persona: ???



Ennoi Boweiter



Age: 21
Cup Size: B
Height: 168cm
Weight: 50kg
Job: Bard
Likes: Freedom, knowledge, festivals
Dislikes: Churches, organizations, S&M, old men, vehicles
Personality: Sharp-tongued and treasures familial bonds.



Kassandra



Kassandra is representative of the succubus race and the de facto leader of the Congregation of Lust. She utilizes the power of love to bring about peace. Yet, the conflicts of the mortal races may still lead to the imminent destruction of the succubus race.
